QuestData.Title: Rest and Relaxation
QuestData.Description: Every adventurer should rest when exhaustion sets in - and there is no finer place to get rest and relaxation than at the Lion's Pride Inn!$B$BMy best friend, Innkeeper Farley, runs the Lion's Pride. If you tell him I sent you, he may give you the special discounted rates on food and drink.$B$BTo find the Lion's Pride Inn, travel south along the road from here -- you can't miss it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Innkeeper Farley at the Lion's Pride Inn.
QuestData.RewardText: Rest and relaxation for the tired and cold -- that's our motto! Please, take a seat by the fire and rest your weary bones.$B$BWould you like to try a sampling of some of our fine food and drink?
